title: How to Verify a Solution
text: If a point is a solution to a system, then it satisfies both equations.

title: Plugging in the Point
text: Let us plug in the point. $$(-3)(-5)-7=8$$, $$8=8$$. The first equation is satisfied. -(-5)F+2(-7)=-9, $$-9=-9$$. The second equation is satisfied. The point is a solution.
